Title: King Kong Lives
Writer: Ronald Shusett (story), Steven Pressfield (story), Ronald Shusett (screenplay), Steven Pressfield (screenplay), Merian C. Cooper (based on the character created by), Edgar Wallace (based on the character created by)
Actors: Peter Elliott, George Antoni, Brian Kerwin, Linda Hamilton
Plot: Kong falls from the twin towers and he appears to be alive. However, his heart is failing, so it's replaced with an artificial one. All is well until he senses that there's a female Kong somewhere out there and escapes wreaking havoc.
